/api2/json/apiStatus.summary: Prints the current status of the classifiers. A classifier name in apiStatus corresponds to a service name in apiServices.

/api2/json/apiUsage.summary: Receive information on your subscription plan and current API usage.

/api2/json/apiUsageHistoryAggregate.summary: Print your API usage history in an aggregated view (by service, by day/hour/min).

/api2/json/apiServices.summary: Receive a list of the API services and usage costs in Units.
